ul.p: 1.1 Prices are based on mix design and inclusive of normal retarders but exclude other admixtures such as super-plasticizer and water proofing agents.

1.2 Price will be maintained for deliveries made after normal working hours on weekdays as well as on Sundays and public holidays. A standby charges / extra charge of RM 10.00 per cubic meter will be added on for supplies commencing after 12.00 midnight.

1.3 Price are based on a single order or a single minimum delivery of 4.0 cubic meter. An additional cartage of RMIOO.OO per load will be charged if the quantity of single delivery is less than 4.0 cubic meter. Additional of cartage of RM120.00 per load will be charged if the quantity of single delivery is less than 2.0 cubic meter.

1.4 Price Variation Clause: Our price is subject to price variation of raw materials (i.e.: bulk cement, fuel, sand, aggregates and etc.) for all orders in progress of deliveries. The difference between market revised price and our quotation calculation will be chargeable to you accordingly.

2.1 Price quote are valid up to fourteen (14) calendar days from the date hereof. Thereafter price are subject to change according to the rates raw materials and any other rates which may be imposed by the government which affect the cost of producing ready mixed concrete.
3.1 We manufacture and guarantee our concrete that follow MS 523: 1993 or BS 5328: 1990 except for temperature of fresh concrete unless otherwise stated.

3.2 Our liability, in the event that concrete is proven to be defective, shall be limited to the replacement of concrete for the affected portion at the structure only, which shall be based on a mutually agreed sum prior to the commencement at works.
3.3 Our Guarantee on our concrete quality excludes failure or rejects arising from:
a) Poor concrete placing, compaction and workmanship at site.
b) Addition of water and/or admixtures by your personal at site,
c) Placing time exceeding 2hours form time of batching due to delay at site unless otherwise stated.
d) Placing concrete when it is raining
3.4 Testing of concrete shall be done in accordance to standard BSI 881 : 1983
3.5 Slumps test, cube making and testing concrete cubes carried out in our own laboratory will be done free of charge. The said test will be carried out upon request in writing only
3.6 Cost of all test carried out by independent laboratories at your request will be borne by your good self.

3.7 Any non-compliance of standard cube strength result must be notified to us in writing within 7 days from the cube test report. We hereby reserve the right to assess the in-situ strength of the concrete elements in accordance of the test results shall be based on BS 6089: 1 981 for compliance.

6.1 Any discrepancy in delivered quantity should be reported in writing to Chin Hin Concrete (K L) Sdn Bhd within Three (3) days from the delivery date. The reported discrepancy in the delivered quantity shall be determined by joint measurement at site in accordance with the Standard Method of Measurement for Building Works and the following wastage in percentages must be allowed tor inclusion in the final calculation of volume.
a) 3% for columns
b) 5% for formed slabs
c) 13% for ground structures e.g. footing. ground beams and slabs
